amendment.description: An amendment numbered 18 printed in House Report 116-6 to direct the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to submit a report to Congress regarding the accessibility and effectiveness of the program for eligible individuals who reside in rural and highly rural areas.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Golden amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Golden amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A018) offered by Mr. Golden.
